div.p:
Grades PK-8 th Tioga Learning Plan
(4-2-20)
Grades PK-8 th learning plan will run on a Sunday-to-Sunday basis, beginning this Sunday, April 5 – Sunday, April 12, and then continuing week-by-week as long as Tioga ISD is closed. This way, families will have time on Sunday evening to plan out their child’s learning time for the coming week, based on the needs of the family. It also . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about EL/MS Learning Plan

div.p: The Tioga High School staff and administration appreciate the grace that has been given as we navigate through this unusual situation. As always our teachers are committed to providing a high quality of instruction and have taken considerable steps to ensure that Tioga students continue to have that opportunity during this unprecedented time. All of our teachers have been working many hours to transition to distance teaching and . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about High School Grading Document

img.alt: Fourth graders visiting the capital in Austin, TX.

div.p:
Fourth graders from Tioga ISD's Tioga Elementary traveled to Austin on an Education in Action Discover Texas Field Trip, Tuesday, March 3, 2020 , to experience what they are learning in Texas History. Students visited the Texas Ranger Hall of Fame and Museum , the Texas State Capitol , and the Bullock Texas State History Museum .
During the charter bus ride to their first . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Fourth Graders Travel to Austin

h3.a: Raise Funds for Tioga ISD with Just a Smile! (https://smile.amazon.com)

div.p: If you shop amazon.com, you can help raise funds for Tioga ISD by shopping https://smile.amazon.com/ . Just sign in with your amazon account, choose Tioga Partners in Education as the organization to support. A portion of your purchase price will be donated to the school. It costs you nothing!

a.aria-label: Read more about Raise Funds for Tioga ISD with Just a Smile! (https://smile.amazon.com)
